title: Molecular Geometry of NH3
credits: This interactive was created by the [Concord Consortium](https://concord.org/) using our [Next-Generation Molecular Workbench](http://mw.concord.org/nextgen/) software, with funding by a grant from [Google.org](https://www.google.org/).
This interactive also uses [JSMol](https://sourceforge.net/projects/jsmol/), licensed under the [LGPL](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.html) license.
about: Observe how the unpaired electrons create the trigonal pyramidal molecular geometry of ammonia.

onLoad: post('jsmolScript', 'm0: set background black; cpk 20%; wireframe 0.1; set measures off; measures off; measure 1 2; measure 2 3; measure 3 4; measure 1 3; measure 1 4; measure 2 4; spin on; set echo nh3echo 0% 100%; set echo nh3echo IMAGE "models/molgeo/p7-nh3-bf3/lewisNH3_small.gif";');
